Detailed Description

This class provides a wrapper to FILE * which makes it easy to read and write to a binary format.

It can also wrap (or copy) an existing buffer in memory, making it easy to read from or write to it.

void* BinaryFile::reserve ( int  len  )  [inline]

Allocate and reserve the given amount of data, and remember to dispose it on destruction.

Return a pointer to the data. This makes this class effectively a memory stream.
